title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, user stories, desired features, and non-functional requirements (e.g., performance, security, scalability, maintainability) for the neurofeedback assistant.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including hardware components, software modules, and data flow.

title: Develop Hardware Components
description: Design and develop the hardware components required for neurofeedback data acquisition and processing.

title: Develop Software Components
description: Develop the software components for data processing, visualization, and user interface.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for neurofeedback data.

title: Develop Testing and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Develop a comprehensive testing and quality assurance plan for the neurofeedback assistant.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures
description: Implement comprehensive security and privacy measures to ensure data protection and user privacy, including but not limited to encryption, secure communication protocols, access controls, and compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA).

title: Develop Deployment and DevOps Strategy
description: Develop a comprehensive deployment and DevOps strategy for the neurofeedback assistant, including continuous integration, continuous delivery/deployment (CI/CD), containerization, infrastructure provisioning, monitoring, and logging. Ensure scalability, reliability, and security best practices are followed.

title: Create User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Create user documentation, training materials, and support resources for the neurofeedback assistant.
